statements: SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM landfill_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM landfill_equipment_inventory WHERE maintenance_scheduled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM landfill_equipment_inventory GROUP BY equipment_type;
SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, purchase_date ASC
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM landfill_equipment_inventory WHERE maintenance_scheduled = TRUE
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, purchase_date FROM landfill_equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_type = 'Excavator' OR equipment_type = 'Bulldozer'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_equipments FROM landfill_equipment_inventory
SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment_inventory WHERE maintenance_scheduled = FALSE ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM landfill_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Excavator'
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM landfill_equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM landfill_equipment WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_equipment FROM landfill_equipment
SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Excavator';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM landfill_equipment WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM landfill_equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_count FROM landfill_equipment WHERE maintenance_frequency >= 5;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM landfill_equipment WHERE equipment_type LIKE 'Loader%' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM landfill_equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, task_description FROM landfill_equipment JOIN maintenance_tasks ON landfill_equipment.id = maintenance_tasks.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE scheduled_date = '2022-12-31';

SELECT equipment_name, technician_name FROM landfill_equipment JOIN maintenance_tasks ON landfill_equipment.id = maintenance_tasks.equipment_id JOIN maintenance_history ON maintenance_tasks.task_id = maintenance_history.task_id;
SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM landfill_equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT task_description, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE technician_name LIKE 'John%';

SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM maintenance_tasks INNER JOIN landfill_equipment ON maintenance_tasks.equipment_id = landfill_equipment.id GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING task_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'A';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp' ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_start_date, task_end_date FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND task_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT log_id, log_details, log_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, task_name, task_start_date, task_end_date FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_tasks ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_tasks.equipment_id WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';

SELECT MAX(log_date) AS last_maintenance_date, equipment_name FROM maintenance_logs JOIN maintenance_tasks ON maintenance_logs.task_id = maintenance_tasks.task_id JOIN equipment ON maintenance_tasks.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date <= NOW();
SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM landfill_equipment WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM landfill_equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT task_description, status FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT technician_name, technician_contact FROM maintenance_technicians;
SELECT * FROM landfill_equipment
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM landfill_equipment WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT e.equipment_name, t.task_description, h.technician_name FROM landfill_equipment e JOIN maintenance_tasks t ON e.equipment_id = t.equipment_id JOIN maintenance_history h ON t.task_id = h.task_id
SELECT m.technician_name, s.scheduled_date, s.completion_date FROM maintenance_technicians m JOIN maintenance_schedule s ON m.technician_id = s.technician_id
SELECT e.equipment_type, COUNT(t.task_id) AS total_tasks FROM landfill_equipment e LEFT JOIN maintenance_tasks t ON e.equipment_id = t.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_type ORDER BY total_tasks DESC
